Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following door problem on a train at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following door problem on a train at Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
